description:
AJRA-27 EMBROIDERED JACQUARD 3 PCS

By Pcs: 3 Pcs Shirt: Jacquard Trouser: Cambric Dupatta: Mesuri Color: Blue

Radiate utter sophistication in the elegance of this yale blue dress, where the deeply distinguished hue serves as a canvas for remarkable embroidery. The shirt features an embroidered neckline and border, with each stitch reflecting time-honored craftsmanship, creating complex patterns that dance across the fabric with panache. Complementing this look is a digitally printed gold mesuri dupatta resembling a ribbon of radiance that accentuates the rich blueness of this traditional ensemble.
DESIGN DETAILS:

Embroidered center panel on dyed jacquard

Embroidered front left & right kali on dyed jacquard

30" embroidered back all over on dyed jacquard

30" embroidered daman border on dyed jacquard

1 meter embroidered sleeve all over on dyed jacquard

1.5 meters wide-width dyed cambric trouser

2.5 meters digital gold mesuri dupatta
